comments.raw_text:
I also noticed this problem, and it is very annoying.
Somehow, the Firefox doesn't seem to maintain input method status.
This usually happens when you switch among a few applications including the Firefox. What I mean is this :

- use the Firefox and type in some Korean text
- change to other application program like the Xcode or the TextEdit
- change back to the Firefox

The input method icon on the menubar indicates that it is in English mode, but it is not actually exactly like that.
If you type, the Korean characters are displayed without being composed.
